drescription: Amazon is built on four goals, customer appreciation over the competition, succession for inventions, devotion to excellent operations, and continual thinking.Amazon endeavors to develop a positive influence on anyone they come in contact with, whether it be consumers or manufactures.Amazon has made delivery scheduling easy as can be. You can now pick the day your package will arrive, including one-day delivery.Amazon has recently branched out allowing consumers to get grocery delivery within two hours of ordering. Let’s not forget about Amazon’s lightning-fast deals that recur every half hour.Each account also can add an additional adult that is in your household by linking the account giving access to all that Amazon has to offer. If that is not enough, Amazon also offers streaming video, music, tablets, dots, and ebooks

address: Menlo Park , California , CA , 94025 , United States
drescription: Facebook is known as one of the larger free worldwide social media networks.One key factors to Facebook is the “wall” that each user is given, this is a virtual interactive bulletin board.Within this, users that have registered can share their thoughts, pictures, videos and other things amongst friends, family and colleagues.The website is available in different languages and includes features for the public usage such as:Events an invitation system and event calendar to invite and keep track of guests.Marketplace - classified ads posted by users to sell belongings and to advertise events and groups.Pages allows users to create pages non-related to their personal profiles to share topics, interests and businesses.Groups  for people with common interests to share and discuss topics.

address: Mountain View , California , CA , 94043 , United States
drescription: Google Inc. is an international company based on a global search engine. Founded in 1998, Google has spread over the Internet, making research results more accessible than ever. Google Chrome has been commonly used as a default search engine for more desktops or laptops because of its easy usage and accuracy.To begin with, Google only allowed search results based on one language, but within its growth there has been dozens of products and services that are offered by Google in order to make people's lives simpler and hassle-free. All of Google services are made for business or personal usage, some of these services include: Google Calendars, Google Drive, Google Home, Google Photos, Google Chrome, Google News, Google Sheets, Google Cloud Search, Google Ads, Google My Business, Google Play Books, Google Analytics, Gboard, Google Plus (now discontinued), Google Street View, Synctastic for Google, Science Journal by Google, Google Admin, Tabs for Google, G-Whizz! For Google Apps and G-Whizz! Plus for Google Apps. Products that Google offers includes, the Google Pixel Cell Phones, Google Next Hub Max, Google Home Minis, Google Home Max, Google Chromecast, Google Home Voice-Activated Smart Speaker, Google Wifi Solution Router Replacement Kits and Google Smart Light Starter Kit with Google Assistant included.

address: Palo Alto , California , CA , 94304 , United States
drescription: Tesla Inc. is a software company that partakes in designing elements, developing process and manufacturing.In 2003, Tesla was founded engineers by the name of Martin Eberhard and Marc Tarpenning.In 2004 Elon Musk teamed up with Tesla as the board of directors and chairman.With this, they wanted Tesla to change the car industry in a revolutionary way.Over the years, Tesla has successfully built not only all eco-friendly cars but also having no ends to clean energy storage and generation products

PwC is a global network and company that provides business consulting, such as taxation, auditing, accounting, strategy management, and human resource services across the world.In 1998, PwC was founded by merging of two companies, Price Waterhouse and Coopers & Lyrbrand. Both companies had histories that originally dated back to the eighteen-hundred.The companies name changed and shortened to PwC in September 2010 for rebranding purposes.With offices in 157 countries, 721 locations and 276,000 employees, PwC serves a large variety of industries worldwide: transportation services, health care professionals, consumer markets, banking, insurance, hospitality, government, energy, automotive, defense and aerospace.

Workday Inc. is an instant human capital management and financial management online software stockist. They provide applications for Human Resources, finances and planning through their Cloud ERP System.They were founded in 2005 by David Duffield who was the former CEO of the company PeopleSoft. Workday was launched in November of 2006. The headquarters are now located within Pleasanton, California and were priorly at Walnut Creek, California as of 2008 Workday decided to within their agreements to purchase Cape Clear Software. Since Workday has been in the works, they have disclosed contracts with many other businesses, this includes Time Warner, Chiquita Brands, CAE Inc., Rentokil Initial, Fairchild Semiconductor, Thomson Reuters, and Aviva.Services are sold through a subscription rather than selling the software all at once with a single purchase. Workdays prices are upfront and nothing to hide, they collect the payment and them as soon as a new client is signed onto the software.
